811470.name: Immunity
811470.description:
With an endless hoard of bacteria swarming toward you, your only choice is to defend yourself. With the help of abilities like toxicity, tracer, and energy shield, blast through these relentless enemies until you can't fight anymore. Use the gold you receive after a round to purchase more power-ups to aid you in your next round.

"What can I expect in the future if I purchase Immunity Early Access?"


  • Many more diseases and areas to fight in.
  • Custom Banners, and titles.
  • Dozens of Steam Achievements!
  • Multiplayer support: Fight as the diseases or the white blood-cells. Who will emerge victorious?
  • White blood-cell upgrades: Speed, Power, Rate of Fire, etc.
  • And so much more!

What's New:
  • In-Game Store - Purchase Toxicity, Rocket, Tracer, Energy Shield, or Super-shot power-ups to gain an edge on your foes!
  • Infected Areas Browse Screen - Purge the existing diseases you find in common areas like the brain, heart, and stomach. This displays the currently active diseases and currently eradicated diseases in the corresponding areas.
  • Additional Enemies - Gingivalis Disease; Fight against symbiotic and viral entities who are more faster and stronger than their lesser entities.

Currently known bugs
Be sure and check ongoing patch notes for PC beta updates going forward. Listed below are all known issues for this version of the game as of November 30, 2019:

  • Sometimes Audio Cuts Out
